headline: Motorola Solutions Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: CHICAGO, May 15, 2025--Motorola Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: MSI) today announced that its board of directors has approved a regular quarterly dividend of one dollar and nine cents ($1.09) per share. The next quarterly dividend will be payable in cash on July 15, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on June 13, 2025.
